topics.body:
You know what I do love about Evangelion though?  My favorite character in Evangelion, Penpen, didn't get turned to tang.  You wouldn't believe how much of a smug look I had in movie theatres when everyone else's favorite characters all got turned into soup and mine was completely untouched.

Side note I like to think all the animal's in the world during third impact had the same reaction as the audience watching it:
A person's pet animal, "What happened to my owner?  Why'd he turn into tang?  Why is there a giant floating person in the sky?  What the fuck is going on?!"
